column5: Our Master of Research in Business and Management is accredited by the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC) and the Scottish Graduate School of Social Science for the training of PhD students. You'll learn how to:undertake doctoral research in business and management equip yourself for an academic or commercial career in business and management research undertake, evaluate, commission or manage research in the commercial, public, or voluntary sectors The MRes course has a strong practical focus and trains you in the advanced skills necessary for business, management, economic and policy research.
